#summary Adding a new booking.

== Synopsis ==

Booking received by telephone/walkin for future date. e.g. 3 guests 1M, 2F in separate dorm rooms for 3 nights. 10+ beds. Take deposit for 1st night.


== Process ==

  # Click [AddBooking Add Booking]
  # Enter booking name, referrer, (deposit, balance to pay on arrival).
  # Select the dates for the booking.
  # 1M allocate to 10 bed resource (tick male only). Click Add.
  # 2F to 10 bed resource (tick female only). Click Add. 
  # Click Save.

If the group/room does not have availability for the specified dates, an error message will be displayed.
